title: FInal Fantasy VII: Crisis Core FMV Collection DVD (VTS Folder)
description:
A Collection of all cut-scenes from the PSP Sensation \"Final Fantasy VII: Crisis Core\".

AUDIO IS JAPANESE!!!!!!!!!!
Subtitles in JAPANESE, and ENGLISH..

SUBTITLES NOT OPTIONAL, JAPANESE AT BOTTOM OF SCREEN, ENGLISH AT TOP OF SCREEN!!!!


Custom Menu, occasionally the Chapter titles overlap, didn\&#039;t notice this prior to burning.

After playback of selected chapter is done, next chapter plays automatically.

Menu stretches flawlessly on my 42\&#039; HDTV.

ON NON-WIDE-SCREEN TV\&#039;S PART OF MENU MAY BE CUT OFF!!!!!!!!!!


*I did not rip game video, I did not translate it, I did not sub it. So don\&#039;t ask.
All credit for the above goes to SilentTweak

All I did was compile and burn it.

I SUGGEST BURNING TO DVD-RW SO YOU CAN SEE WHETHER YOU LIKE IT BEFORE FINALIZING IT..

As always, this is real, no bullshit.

Enjoy, and please help seed, on future FMV compilations I will make sure everything is perfect...
